Sentencas: High temperature co-electrolysis of H2O and CO2 offers a promising route for syngas (H-2, CO) production via efficient use of heat and electricity.
Titulo: A model-based understanding of solid-oxide electrolysis cells (SOECs) for syngas production by H2O/CO2 co-electrolysis

Sentencas: The performance of a SOEC during co-electrolysis is investigated by focusing on the interactions between transport processes and electrochemical parameters.
Titulo: A model-based understanding of solid-oxide electrolysis cells (SOECs) for syngas production by H2O/CO2 co-electrolysis

Sentencas: Electrochemistry at the three-phase boundary is modeled by a modified Butler-Volmer approach that considers H2O electrolysis and CO2 electrolysis, individually, as electrochemically active charge transfer pathways.
Titulo: A model-based understanding of solid-oxide electrolysis cells (SOECs) for syngas production by H2O/CO2 co-electrolysis

Sentencas: The model is independent of the geometrical structure.
Titulo: A model-based understanding of solid-oxide electrolysis cells (SOECs) for syngas production by H2O/CO2 co-electrolysis

Sentencas: A 42-step elementary heterogeneous reaction mechanism for the thermo-catalytic chemistry in the fuel electrode, the dusty gas model (DGM) to account for multi-component diffusion through porous media, and a plug flow model for flow through the channels are used in the model.
Titulo: A model-based understanding of solid-oxide electrolysis cells (SOECs) for syngas production by H2O/CO2 co-electrolysis

Sentencas: Two sets of experimental data are reproduced by the simulations, in order to deduce parameters of the electrochemical model.
Titulo: A model-based understanding of solid-oxide electrolysis cells (SOECs) for syngas production by H2O/CO2 co-electrolysis

Sentencas: The influence of micro-structural properties, inlet cathode gas velocity, and temperature are discussed.
Titulo: A model-based understanding of solid-oxide electrolysis cells (SOECs) for syngas production by H2O/CO2 co-electrolysis

Sentencas: Reaction flow analysis is performed, at OCV, to study methane production characteristics and kinetics during co-electrolysis.
Titulo: A model-based understanding of solid-oxide electrolysis cells (SOECs) for syngas production by H2O/CO2 co-electrolysis

Sentencas: Simulations are carried out for configurations ranging from simple one-dimensional electrochemical button cells to quasi-two-dimensional co-flow planar cells, to demonstrate the effectiveness of the computational tool for performance and design optimization.
Titulo: A model-based understanding of solid-oxide electrolysis cells (SOECs) for syngas production by H2O/CO2 co-electrolysis
